name: Candy Adventure
description:
Candy Adventure is a platformer puzzle game.
The basic mechanics of the game are to go to the designated place using a portal that can be created.
As the stage progresses, you can feel the newness by adding several mechanics.

Key Features
- Solve puzzles using two portals that can be created
- More than 30 stages
- Easy control
- Story that goes through Cut scenes and Dialogue
- Cute Candy and his friends
- Comfortable graphics

Story
One day a little puppy Candy goes for a walk. Walking is the Candy's most favorite thing.
Candy enters the strange door while he is playing.
What will happen to Candy?
